statements: DELETE FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND name LIKE 'John%';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR');
DELETE FROM employees WHERE id = 1 AND department = 'IT';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
DELETE FROM departments WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Departments WHERE location = 'New York' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE contact_type = 'Emergency' AND contact_info LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
DELETE FROM salaries WHERE employee_id = 1002 AND amount > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 101 AND department = 'IT';
DELETE FROM Address WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
